title: Compare economic systems of the North and South

content.question: Answer (a), (b), and (c).Briefly explain ONE important difference between the economic systems of the North and the South in the period 1790–1840.Briefly explain ANOTHER important difference between the economic systems of the North and the South in the period 1790–1840.Briefly explain ONE important connection between the economic systems of the North and the South in the same period.

frqParts.text: Answer (a), (b), and (c).Briefly explain ONE important difference between the economic systems of the North and the South in the period 1790–1840.Briefly explain ANOTHER important difference between the economic systems of the North and the South in the period 1790–1840.Briefly explain ONE important connection between the economic systems of the North and the South in the same period.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
